thread.section_title: Saint Dominique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: business trip
thread.title_full: business trip - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Emilia D
title: business trip
text:
The hotel has an excellent location. My room was on the 5th floor, small, but very cosy, reminded me of a doll's house. The receptionist lady was extremely kind and polite. I stayed too short to be able to add more, but my overall impression is very good. Only one suggestion: maybe breakfast could be served earlier, for example at 6:30 instead of 7:00.
Room Tip: Best location. See more room tips
